quoteText: We share your personal data when we in good faith believe it is necessary for us to do so in order to comply with a legal obligation under applicable law, or respond to valid legal process, such as a search warrant, a court order, or a subpoena
title: No promise to inform about government requests

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
tosdr.tldr: Spotify does not explicitly state that they will inform users of any law or government requests regarding any personal user information.
